name: Chrome Echoes
description:
Follow your favorite mysterious assassin, Ziv Chromebeak as he blasts through a high-octane, space grand prix! Race against all your favorite Steel Love characters as they compete for the grand prize: a brand new robot built by Ziv's own brother, Bif Chromebeak. How is Bif still alive? Can he truly build an actual giant robot? Ziv will have to win the grand prix if he wants all the answers!

The game is designed to be played more than once. Characters will have different dialogue based on how they are performing in the races, and there's 4 different endings based on your final placing.

Controller is highly recommended!

Please read the How to Play in the main menu!

Submit your times to the online leaderboard by playing tracks from Track Select!

You can upgrade your ship by interacting with it in Hangar 1.

Programming & Story: Abopo
Programming & Track Design: HyakuRiki
2D & 3D Art: Handstandish
Music: Lanceolate
Other assets: Polygon Space Assets by Synty, Yarn Spinner by Secret Lab, SFX by Epidemic Sound
